void App::OnGLEvent ( GLNotifyEvent &  event  )  [private]

redirect GL -Notify-Event to specific operations

Definition at line 396 of file App.cpp.

00397 {
00398         //on double click select assembly
00399         if (event.getMouseEvent().ButtonDClick(LEFT_BUTTON))
00400         {
00401                 m_MouseCtrl->setSelected(event);
00402         }
00403         
00404         //if any mouse down set mediator and on right down, select too
00405         else if (event.getMouseEvent().ButtonDown(-1))
00406         {
00407                 m_MouseCtrl->setMediator(event);
00408                 
00409                 if (event.getMouseEvent().ButtonDown(RIGHT_BUTTON))
00410                 {
00411                         //m_MouseCtrl->setMediator(event);
00412                         m_MouseCtrl->setSelected(event);
00413                 }
00414         }
00415         
00416         //if left or middle mouse button is down, translate event to mediator
00417         else if (event.getMouseEvent().ButtonIsDown(-1))
00418         {
00419                 m_MouseCtrl->activateMediator(event);
00420         }
00421         
00422         //if left or middle mouse button goes up, create command-object for undo
00423         else if (event.getMouseEvent().ButtonUp(LEFT_BUTTON) || event.getMouseEvent().ButtonUp(MIDDLE_BUTTON))
00424         {
00425                 m_MouseCtrl->deactivateMediator();
00426         }
00427         
00428         //if event is scroll-event, translate event to mediator
00429         else if (event.getMouseEvent().GetWheelRotation())
00430         {
00431                 m_MouseCtrl->setMediator(event);
00432                 m_MouseCtrl->activateMediator(event);
00433         }
00434 }

void App::OnCreatePrimitiveEvent ( CreatePrimitiveEvent &  event  )  [private]

handles createPrimitiveEvent and creates a new primitive

Definition at line 447 of file App.cpp.

00448 {
00449         if (event.getPrimitiveType() == CUBOID)
00450         {
00451                 Vertex origin(0.0,0.0,0.0);
00452                 Assembly* atomic;
00453                 
00454                 //get creator instance
00455                 PrimitiveCreator creator;
00456                 
00457                 //create new parent assembly (group of primitives)
00458                 Assembly* primitive = new Assembly(wxT("Wandteil"));
00459                 
00460                 //put information of whole group in parent
00461                 primitive->setType(IS_PRIMITIVE);
00462                 primitive->setCenterVertex(event.getPosition());
00463                 primitive->setRotateVertex(event.getAngles());
00464                 primitive->setWidth(event.getDimensions().getX());
00465                 primitive->setHeight(event.getDimensions().getY());
00466                 primitive->setDepth(event.getDimensions().getZ());
00467                 
00468                 //create smallest part of primitive
00469                 creator.createCuboid(origin, origin, event.getDimensions());
00470                 
00471                 //set color to default
00472                 creator.setMaterial(primitive, DEFAULT_IMPORT_COLOR);
00473                 
00474                 //get the primitive
00475                 atomic = creator.getPrimitive();
00476                 
00477                 //insert 'small' cuboid in parent
00478                 primitive->addPart(atomic);
00479                 
00480                 //put whole in the world
00481                 m_Scene->insertAssembly(primitive);
00482         }
00483         
00484         m_Scene->glRefresh();
00485 }

void App::OAXImport ( wxString  filename  )  [private]

handle oax import

Parameters:
[in] filename File to import.

Definition at line 514 of file App.cpp.

00515 {
00516         // string to store category
00517         wxString cat;
00518         
00519         // string to store name
00520         wxString name;
00521         
00522         // new filename
00523         wxFileName file;
00524         
00525         // asign filename
00526         file.Assign(filename);
00527         
00528         // create dialog and ask for name
00529         wxTextEntryDialog ted(NULL, wxT("Kategorie, in die importiert werden soll:"));
00530         
00531         // set standard value
00532         ted.SetValue(wxT("Sonstiges"));
00533         
00534         if (ted.ShowModal() == wxID_CANCEL || ted.GetValue().IsEmpty())
00535         {
00536                 // if pressed cancel or void text, take standard category
00537                 cat = wxT("Sonstiges");
00538         }
00539         else
00540         {
00541                 cat = ted.GetValue();
00542         }
00543         
00544         // create wxFFileInputStream
00545         wxFFileInputStream inFile(filename);
00546         
00547         // create wxMemoryoutputStream
00548         wxMemoryOutputStream outMem;
00549         
00550         // copy data
00551         inFile.Read(outMem);
00552         
00553         // dreate wxMemoryInputStream
00554         wxMemoryInputStream inMem(outMem);
00555         
00556         // wxInputStream pointer
00557         wxInputStream* input = &inMem;
00558         
00559         // set name
00560         name = file.GetName();
00561         
00562         // add into lib
00563         m_TreeLibCtrl->addEntry(name, *input, cat);
00564 }

void App::OAXExport ( wxString  reference  )  [private]

handle oax export

Parameters:
[in] reference File to export to.

Definition at line 570 of file App.cpp.

00571 {
00572         // filename
00573         const wxString& filename = wxFileSelector(wxT("Object als OAX exportieren..."), wxT(""), wxT(""), wxT(""), wxT("OaxDatei (*.oax)|*.oax"), wxFD_SAVE);
00574         
00575         if (filename.IsEmpty())
00576         {
00577                 // user canceled, do nothing
00578                 return;
00579         }
00580         
00581         // wxFFileOutputStream
00582         wxFFileOutputStream outFile(filename);
00583         
00584         // wxMemoryOutputStream to store oax data
00585         wxMemoryOutputStream* memOut;
00586         
00587         // get data
00588         memOut = m_TreeLibCtrl->exportEntry(reference);
00589         
00590         // wxMemoryInputStream
00591         wxMemoryInputStream inMem(*memOut);
00592         
00593         // copy data
00594         inMem.Read(outFile);
00595         
00596         // delete memOut
00597         delete memOut;
00598 }

Definition at line 643 of file App.cpp.

00644 {
00645         // create new memory output stream
00646         wxMemoryOutputStream memOut;
00647         
00648         // pointer to wxOutputStream
00649         wxOutputStream* outStream = &memOut;
00650         
00651         // create new OaxExport - object

00662         
00663         // successfull
